CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Overtime_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), Work_Overtime_amount__c *52, IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Overtime_Frequency__c ,"Fortnightly"), Work_Overtime_amount__c *26, IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Overtime_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), Work_Overtime_amount__c *12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Work_Overtime_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), Work_Overtime_amount__c *1, Work_Overtime_amount__c)))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Commission_or_Bonus_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), Commission_or_Bonus_amount__c *52, IF(ISPICKVAL(Commission_or_Bonus_Frequency__c ,"Fortnightly"), Commission_or_Bonus_amount__c *26, IF(ISPICKVAL(Commission_or_Bonus_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), Commission_or_Bonus_amount__c *12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Commission_or_Bonus_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), Commission_or_Bonus_amount__c *1, Commission_or_Bonus_amount__c)))) + IF(ISPICKVAL(Allowance_Frequency__c ,"Weekly"), Allowance_Amount__c *52, IF(ISPICKVAL(Allowance_Frequency__c ,"Fortnightly"), Allowance_Amount__c *26, IF(ISPICKVAL(Allowance_Frequency__c ,"Monthly"), Allowance_Amount__c *12, IF(ISPICKVAL(Allowance_Frequency__c ,"Annually"), Allowance_Amount__c *1, Allowance_Amount__c))))
CustomField.label: Employment o/t allow & Comm p.a.
